EmailTemplate.description: Salesforce has been removed from the NCR IT Help Desk Drop Down
EmailTemplate.name: Salesforce Help
EmailTemplate.subject: Updated Salesforce Support Contact Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Please be advised that you can no longer submit a Salesforce support ticket from the IT Help Desk drop-down menu. If you need Salesforce support, you will need to create a NEED HELP ticket from your Salesforce home page or send an email to, nsc.administration@ncr.com.
Zuora support can still be reached through the IT Help Desk under Zuora (SCA).
Thank you,
The Salesforce Admin Team
